meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the February 14, 2024 City Council Meeting
An ordinance amending ordinance No. 27485, granting a franchise to Oncor Electric Delivery Company LLC
agenda_items.description: Extending the term and providing for its renewal with minor modifications - Estimated Annual Revenue: General Fund $50,000,000

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32554
agenda_items.description: Authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2023-24 for the maintenance and operation of various departments.

agenda_items.title: Authorize rescinding the Community Development Block Grant Contract
agenda_items.description: To complete public facility improvements to the Forest Theater located at 1918 Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard.

agenda_items.title: Authorize initial support of the approach for development of the new 5-Year Consolidated Plan
agenda_items.description: Covering the period of FY 2024-25 through FY 2028-29 for the four U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development grant funds.

agenda_items.title: Authorize public hearings to be held on March 27, 2024, May 22, 2024, and August 28, 2024
agenda_items.description: To receive comments on the FY 2024-25 Operating, Capital, and Grant & Trust Budgets.

agenda_items.title: Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Ignacio Cuevas and Rita Cuevas
Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Vicki Timpa
Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Timothy Shearer
Authorize the annual adoption of the City’s Investment Policy
agenda_items.description: Investment strategies regarding funds under the City’s control and management.

financial_items.description: Estimated Annual Revenue from Oncor Electric Delivery Company LLC franchise
Funding for various departments and activities
